title: *~*~ QUALITY 4+BR/2BA + LARGE FAMILY ROOM + 1 GARAGE SPACE ~*~*
posting_body: Available September 1, 2022.
Completely restored and renovated luxury 4+ bedroom + family room on beautiful tree-lined street -- three blocks from Lincoln Square proper.
This sunny duplex apartment feels like a home.
Stunning new granite kitchen with glass top stove, self-cleaning oven, microwave, Bosch dishwasher, 42" maple cabinets, pantry, and under-cabinet lighting.
New granite, glass tile, and chrome designer bathrooms with recessed lighting and lots of linen storage.
Living room with working fireplace.
Formal dining room with chandelier and built-in hutch.
Large family room on lower level, plus laundry room with full-size washer, dryer and storage area.
Beautiful hardwood floors and woodwork throughout, including oak staircase.
Ceiling fans in two main-floor bedrooms, kitchen, and living room.
Central air.
All rooms cable ready.
Walk-in closet in master bedroom.
Coat closet in foyer.
Large enclosed heated back porch.
All new insulated windows.
Close to Lawrence Ave. Metra, Western Ravenswood CTA (Brown Line), Mariano's, Winnemac Park, and Lincoln Square movies, restaurants, shopping.
1 garage parking space is included and Bell Avenue has permit parking.
Yard privileges.
The apartment is located at 4814 North Bell and is available September 1.
Early move-in is available.
Text or call Roger at 1-773-787-6667 to set up a viewing appointment.
